title: Pakistan raising effective voice against Israel’s barbarism: Buledi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 7 (APP):Secretary General National Party, Senator Jan Muhammad Buledi on Monday said that Pakistan was raising its effective voice on all international forums against Israel’s barbarism and atrocities to impede the genocide of Palestinians.
Addressing the All-Parties Conference to express solidarity with Palestinians, the senator said that the main purpose of calling the APC was to form a joint strategy to put pressure on Israel to stop the bloodshed of oppressed Palestinians.
He strongly condemned the killing and slaughter in Gaza and appealed to all Muslim countries to hoist their voice for Palestinians and help them in this difficult time.
He categorically stated that Israel was violating all international human rights laws, perpetrating gruesome human rights violations in Gaza, adding that the United Nations (US) should implement its resolutions in this regard.
